ISSUE.TITLE: podman [X] --filter pod : documented in man pages, not in command completion
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: The following commands list `pod` as a valid option to `--filter`, in man pages, and AFAICT it works, but `podman X --filter <TAB>` does not list "pod": - [ ] podman container list - [ ] podman container pause - [ ] podman container ps - [ ] podman container restart - [ ] podman container rm - [ ] podman container start - [ ] podman container stop - [ ] podman container unpause - [ ] podman pause - [ ] podman ps - [ ] podman restart - [ ] podman rm - [ ] podman start - [ ] podman stop - [ ] podman unpause
